name: Rule the red planet
description:
Rule the red planet is a space base buidling game in pre alpha
you land on Mars and try to colonize it

here's a design document to show you what the game might be like in the future

the game starts on September 1, 1969
after the first moonlanding
 
Russia set their eyes on mars after their defeat on the moon the US take's notice and the Race is on!

you play between Russia, US(maybe china vs japan) and pick a Path to how you approach the game
Between military, Pacifist, Economic and Trade, Science and Tech

each Path as their own ending for each nation
Military could end in a Nuclear war and end the game Early
Pacifist could end with a peaceful deal with the two super Powers
Economics and Trade could end when you have a high amount of cash
Science and tech could end when Mars is Inhabitable for Human Life

or if the end goal is never reached, the game reach the 90's and the winner
is the won who gained most from theses fields(a high score if you will)

you run a space agency and work with the government
you can take bribes and spy on your enemy
try and figure out their next move and beat them!(just don't let the public find out about the torturing)

each election will add new Obstacles and bonus to your game

due to the success of the space race your agency will get a bonus at the start

when colonizing mars your goal for a base is to set it up in a way where it can survive on it's own so you can focus on more important issues like trading and other colony's

Rule the red planet is a Base building, geopolitical, Alternative History Sandbox Game
note: none of the politics in this game aren't meant to be leaning of any political Ideology
or i in anyway in support of, they are just in there to interact each other in interesting ways
